entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
